expected_cleaned_title: Anurag Basu's 'Metro… In Dino' is an interesting and ambitious experiment, but it stays at a distance and we end up feeling very little
expected_cleaned_short_review: Metro… In Dino: The film is about a number of characters in a number of relationship conflicts. Some are treated seriously, some are treated comically, and there's definitely a vision – but there's no emotional connection.

original_short_review: SPOILERS AHEAD. The film showcases middle class dreams. You can watch the trailer here: link. Baradwaj Rangan says it's well-made.
expected_cleaned_title: Sri Ganesh's '3BHK' (Siddharth, Sarathkumar) is a well-made drama that showcases the middle class by focusing on their one big dream
expected_cleaned_short_review: 3BHK: Shiva, Grace Antony, and Mithul Ryan play an urban family that, like the title says, learns to fly away. The sweet, gentle, musical feel of the film makes even the feel-bad moments of life seem like a feel-good experience.

expected_cleaned_title: Ram's 'Paranthu Po' is a beautiful, kind, funny road movie about the ups and downs of life
expected_cleaned_short_review: Paranthu Po: The readily identifiable story is about moving out of rented houses and buying a home. And despite the many issues faced by the family, the director ensures that the film is an easy, pleasant watch.
